title: Step 1: Create Your Account
desc: Sign up easily using your email or social accounts to get instant access to our dashboard.

title: Step 2: Add Parcel Details
desc: Fill up pickup & delivery addresses, package details, and special instructions in a few clicks.

title: Step 3: Schedule Pickup
desc: Choose a convenient pickup time and our delivery partner will collect your parcel right on time.

title: Step 4: Track in Real-Time
desc: Monitor your parcel movement from pickup to doorstep with live tracking and instant notifications.

title: Step 5: Get Delivered Safely
desc: We ensure fast, secure and reliable delivery at your customer’s doorstep maintaining maximum safety.
